channel.title: Embedded on Akhil's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Embedded on Akhil's Homepage

item.title: Study And Implementation Of Real Time Operating Systems For 8-bit Microcontrollers
item.description: Report on Internship at IIT Delhi in summer 2011. I studied Real Time operating systems (RTOS) and surveyed the possible RTOS options available for a TinyAVR microcontrollers. Chose to use Femto OS. Built the reference board and implemented an I2C driver for Femto OS for the design.

item.title: Design and implementation of a programmer for TI CC2530
item.description: As Part of Internship at IIT Delhi, Learnt the basics related to using linux and open source tools to do projects in embedded systems. As a minor task to show case the knowledge I had to develop a microcontroller based programmer for the SoC TI CC2530. I Developed the embedded hardware and software for the programmer based on a given design. Also patched the Linux OS application for the programmer to provide it the ability to recognize and program the SoC.

item.title: PC Board Design for 8051 Microcontroller
item.description: As Part of Internship at IIT Delhi, Learnt the basics related to embedded systems, in particular microcontrollers and PCB design for a basic development board for the 8051.
